name: ClinicalTrialParticipant
title: Clinical Trial Participant
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains the social context used to identify patients enrolled in a clinical trial in which patients with the same condition as the measure set were being studied.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients enrolled in a clinical trial in which patients with the same condition as the measure set were being studied. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the Patient Characteristic category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include SNOMED codes that identify the individual in a healthcare environment enrolled as a clinical trial participant.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
